instructions: Image titled Leave a Group Text on Android Step 1 1 Open the Messages app on your Android. Find and tap the Image titled Android7messages.png icon on your Apps menu to open Messages. Image titled Leave a Group Text on Android Step 2 2 Tap the group you want to leave. Find the group message thread you want to delete on the list of your recent messages, and open it. Image titled Leave a Group Text on Android Step 3 3 Tap the button. This button is in the upper-right corner of your message conversation. It will open a drop-down menu. Image titled Leave a Group Text on Android Step 8 4 Tap on the menu. This option will delete the selected group conversation, and remove it from your Messages app. If you're prompted to confirm your action, tap OK to confirm and delete the group. Advertisement

Image titled Leave a Group Text on Android Step 1 1 Open the Messages app on your Android. Find and tap the Image titled Android7messages.png icon on your Apps menu to open Messages. Image titled Leave a Group Text on Android Step 2 2 Tap the group you want to leave. Find the group message thread you want to delete on the list of your recent messages, and open it. Image titled Leave a Group Text on Android Step 7 3 Tap the button on the top-right. It will open a drop-down menu. Image titled Leave a Group Text on Android Step 4 4 Tap on the menu. This will open your message settings for the selected conversation. Image titled Leave a Group Text on Android Step 5 5 Slide the switch to Image titled Android7switchoff.png . This will disable all message and member notifications from the selected message thread. You won't receive any push, light or sound notifications from this group anymore. Advertisement
